BUTTON.SCRIPT: if false == UISelf:IsDisable() then MarketTabChange(3) end
if false == UISelf:IsDisable() then MarketTabChange(4) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kCheck = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("CBTN_ONLY_CASH") if false == kCheck:IsNil() then kCheck:CheckState( not kCheck:GetCheckState() ) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: if false == UISelf:IsDisable() then RequestSoldReceive(UISelf:GetParent()) end

EDIT.SCRIPT: local cust = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then UISelf:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) UISelf:SetEditFocus(true) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: if not UISelf:GetCheckState() then UISelf:CheckState(true) end
Auction_Tree_Reset(UISelf) local Data = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() SelectItemType(1, Data)

NAME.SCRIPT: UISelf:SetStaticTextW(GetTT(403255 + UISelf:GetBuildIndex())) if UISelf:GetBuildIndex() > 0 then UISelf:Visible(false) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kSelf = UISelf if kSelf:GetBuildIndex() == 0 then kSelf:CheckState(true) kSelf:LockClick(true) else kSelf:LockClick(false) kSelf:CheckState(false) end

FORM.SCRIPT: local kEditSellValue = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetControl("FRM_REG_TYPE1"):GetControl("EDT_SELL_VALUE") if not kEditSellValue:IsNil() then kEditSellValue:SetEditFocus(true) end
local kEditSellValue = UISelf:GetParent():GetParent():GetParent():GetControl("FRM_REG_TYPE1"):GetControl("EDT_SELL_VALUE") if not kEditSellValue:IsNil() then kEditSellValue:SetEditFocus(true) end

ICON.SCRIPT: local iItemNo = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iItemNo ~= 0 then UISelf:CallIconToolTip() else CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(403158), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end

FORM.SCRIPT: UISelf:Visible(true) local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_GOLD") if not kEdit:IsNil() then kEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end
local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_GOLD") if kEdit:IsNil() == false then local cust = kEdit:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then kEdit:SetEditFocus(true) kEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end end

local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_GOLD") if kEdit:IsNil() == false then kEdit:SetEditFocus(true) end local kBtnGold = UISelf:GetControl("CBTN_GOLD_SELL") if not kBtnGold:IsNil() then kBtnGold:CheckState(true) end local kBtnCash = UISelf:GetControl("CBTN_CASH_SELL") if not kBtnCash:IsNil() then kBtnCash:CheckState(false) end

ICON.SCRIPT: local iItemNo = UISelf:GetCustomDataAsInt() if iItemNo ~= 0 then UISelf:CallIconToolTip() else CallToolTipText(0, GetTextW(403158), GetUIWnd("Cursor"):GetLocation()) end

CHECK_BUTTON.SCRIPT: AuctionRadioAction(UISelf:GetParent(), 2, 1) if UISelf:GetCheckState() == true then kEditCash = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("EDT_SELL_GOLD") if kEditCash:IsNil() == false then kEditCash:SetEditFocus(true) end end

AuctionRadioAction(UISelf:GetParent(), 2, 2) if UISelf:GetCheckState() == true then kEditCash = UISelf:GetParent():GetControl("EDT_SELL_CASH") if kEditCash:IsNil() == false then kEditCash:SetEditFocus(true) end end

FORM.SCRIPT: UISelf:Visible(false) local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_VALUE") if not kEdit:IsNil() then kEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(0) end
local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_VALUE") if kEdit:IsNil() == false then local cust = kEdit:GetCustomDataAsInt() if cust == 0 then kEdit:SetEditFocus(true) kEdit:SetCustomDataAsInt(1) end end
local kEdit = UISelf:GetControl("EDT_SELL_VALUE") if kEdit:IsNil() == false then kEdit:SetEditFocus(true) end

BUTTON.SCRIPT: local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799447):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 66); DeletePacket(kPacket) return true
BUTTON.HOTKEY: local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799447):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 66); DeletePacket(kPacket) return true
local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799447):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 66); DeletePacket(kPacket) return true
local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799450):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 66); DeletePacket(kPacket) return true
local kPacket = NewPacket() CallCommonMsgYesNoBox(GetTT(799447):GetStr(), kPacket, true, 66); DeletePacket(kPacket) return true

STATIC_FORM.SCRIPT: if false == CheckVendorRemainTime() then CommonMsgBoxByTextTable(799458, true) RequestVendorExit() end
